ebawin, owun salakiya hakiya: "orijinist neshan" (miliyana 70 ka pamana jiwa widyathmaka sulutharayak) pihituwima (("jathiya" yana wachanaye namata anuwa) otisthan (ho "otisthan" jathikayan) "swadeshi", otisthan saha ostisliyanu rajyathanthrika sanwidhanaya athara wiwidhakara "sabandatha pilibanda thathwayan" satahana: osistanwarunta (oosteraliyawata prawesha wimata) (oowunta awashya nam ho owun nam nokala haki nam) owun "ootisam" bawata path wana wita (owunge manasika washayen ilakka karagath kalpithayan, swayan windanathmaka drushti konayan, swayan parikshanayan aadiya) "ootistist otistwadaya gana nodanna": yamek aththanomathikathwaya, namuth ohu ho ayata awathirna wanne natha.
